description:
Come over for a fun CoComelon playdate with JJ at his house. You’ll get to meet JJ’s friends and family, play musical minigames, and have fun with shapes and numbers!

There are lots of fun interactive objects to pick up and play with, you can sing along to CoComelon favorites like Yes Yes Vegetables and Wheels on the Bus, and not least – build your very own CoComelon sticker collection along the way!

CoComelon Play with JJ gives kids the chance to play inside their favorite show. With simple, interactive minigames, little ones will have hours of learning fun with JJ!"

PLAY MUSICAL MINIGAMES – Play and sing along with favorite songs including Yes Yes Vegetables 

EXPLORE INTERACTIVE OBJECTS – Pick up and play with objects in JJ’s house, garden and treehouse

ENJOY SIMPLE CONTROLS – Use touchscreen controls suitable for little hands, or button controls

COLLECT THEM ALL – Build your CoComelon sticker collection as you explore and play

Supported languages: 

(AUDIO)  German, English (United States), Spanish (Mexico), French, Italian

(SUBTITLES) German, English (United States), Spanish (Mexico), French, Italian
name: CoComelon: Play with JJ
intro: Come over for a playdate with JJ full of musical minigames, interactive objects, and favorite singalongs like Yes Yes Vegetables and Wheels on the Bus!
